channel.title: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:
channel.description:
1. can anyone plz help me i am wondering how to take quests out it says that i have to complete a quest to use dragon weapons and for magic etc. how do i take them out plzz help.
2. also how do i make non existing items like regualar items because it says my d claws are non existing plzz help.
thanks, smerf45

thanks

item.title: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

In the login method, you would add q1 = 15;
That should work. Search the message you see when you log in, and add it above that.

item.title: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

ok thanks i got the part on the d claws

hers is what it looks like in my client.java for a quest

would i be editing that ??

public void q1help() {
sendQuest(“Lost city”, 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
if(q1 == 0){
sendQuest(“I can start this quest by talking to the Warrior.”, 8147);
sendQuest(“He is located near a training place.”, 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest("", 8150);
}
if(q1 == 1){
sendQuest(“The Warrior says something about ‘Zanaris’”, 8147);
sendQuest(“I should head to Falador to get some information.”, 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest("", 8150);
}
if(q1 == 2){
sendQuest(“The Archer at Falador says I will need a dramen staff.”, 8147);
sendQuest(“I can get one at Entrana, but where in Entrana?”, 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest("", 8150);
}
if(q1 == 3){
sendQuest(“I can now cut down the Dramen tree.”, 8147);
sendQuest(“When I have the staff, I should search for the lost city.”, 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest("", 8150);
}
if(q1 == 15){
sendQuest(“I have completed the quest!”, 8147);
sendQuest(“I can now visit Zanaris.”, 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest("", 8150);
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream()

item.source: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:

item.title: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Queststage is an example. In MY character moreinfo files, I see:

[QUESTS] character-questpoints = 0 character-quest_1 = 0 character-quest_2 = 0 character-quest_3 = 0

So I’d search for quest_3, quest3, quest 3, etc.

And item.cfg, yes. It would look like this, using my dragon waraxe example:

item = 8178 Dragon_Waraxe A_super_strong_Dragon_Waraxe 15000000 15000000 15000000 87 85 56 -12 -3 7 10 15 -3 4 25 0

Please, do take note on those underscores (_) and the 10 numbers after the three price values [;

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:

item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

is the queststage in the source file jw bcuz i dont know where thats at.

also you said in item.cfg is that for the d claws making them an item instead of non existing ??

thanks, smerf

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:

item.title: Need help with removing quests plzzz help :confused:
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

  1. Find the variable for quests. I.E., it might be queststage. Find that out! To do so, try searching the message you get when you try to do something. Above it should be if(VARIABLE == #) and that’s what you want. Then, in the login process, set that variable to its maximum(like if the quest needs to be like 1, then set VARIABLE = 1; in the login method).
    Feel free to ask questions there, but do try rereading it first.

  2. Item.cfg. Scroll to the bottom and simply add it. Make sure to use tabs [;

Read full topic
